Package io.atlasmap.service

Class DocumentService

java.lang.Object
io.atlasmap.service.BaseAtlasService
io.atlasmap.service.DocumentService
@Path("/project/{mappingDefinitionId}/document") public class DocumentService extends BaseAtlasService
Provides backend REST services for handling Documents.
